data.name: CreateObligationAdmActionExemption
ReadAdministrativeAction
data.value: select top(1) TYPE from CKT_ADMIN_ACTION where TYPE = @type

data.name: ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCsePersonAccount
data.value: select top(1) CSP_NUMBER, TYPE from CKT_CSE_PERSON_ACC where (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (TYPE = 'R')

data.name: ReadFips
data.value: select top(1) [STATE], COUNTY, LOCATION, COUNTY_DESC, STATE_ABBREVIATION, COUNTY_ABBR from CKT_FIPS where (LOCATION = @location) and (COUNTY = @county) and ([STATE] = @state)

data.name: ReadObligationObligationType
data.value: select top(1) T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.OB_ID, T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID, T1.LGA_ID, T2.DEBT_TYP_CD, T2.DEBT_TYP_NM from CKT_OB_TYPE T2 join CKT_OBLIGATION T1 on (@cpaType = T1.CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = T1.CSP_NUMBER) and (T1.OB_ID = @obId) and (T2.DEBT_TYP_ID = T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID) and (T2.DEBT_TYP_ID = @debtTypId)

data.name: ReadObligationTribunal
data.value: select distinct T1.CPA_TYPE, T1.CSP_NUMBER, T1.OB_ID, T1.DTY_GENERATED_ID, T1.LGA_ID, T2.JUDICIAL_DIVISION, T2.TRIBUNAL_NM, T2.FIP_LOCATION, T2.JUDICIAL_DISTRICT, T2.IDENTIFIER, T2.FIP_COUNTY, T2.FIP_STATE from CKT_TRIBUNAL T2 join CKT_LEGAL_ACTION T3 join CKT_OBLIGATION T1 on (@cpaType = T1.CPA_TYPE) and (@cspNumber = T1.CSP_NUMBER) and (T3.LEGAL_ACTION_ID = T1.LGA_ID) and (T3.COURT_CASE_NO = @courtCaseNo) on T2.IDENTIFIER = T3.TRB_ID

data.name: ReadObligationType
data.value: select top(1) DEBT_TYP_ID, DEBT_TYP_CD, DEBT_TYP_NM from CKT_OB_TYPE where DEBT_TYP_ID = @debtTypId

data.name: ReadServiceProvider
data.value: select top(1) SERVICE_PRVDER_ID, USER_ID, LAST_NAME, FIRST_NAME, MIDDLE_INITIAL from CKT_SERVICE_PRVDER where USER_ID = @userId
